messages.content: Hello! I'm here and ready to learn. What's on your mind?
Cat is an animal and mammal. It has fur, tail and whiskers. It can meow, purr and climb.
I don't know much about griffin yet. Can you tell me about it?
A griffin is a creature with eagle head and lion body
I don't know much about creature yet. Can you tell me about it?
Let me think about griffin... griffin is a creature.
I'm doing well - I've been learning. I know about 4 things now. How are you?
You're welcome. I'm glad I could help.
Goodbye! I enjoyed our conversation and learned from it.
